choose_language_description: Select the language for your course content. Learn in the way that's most comfortable for you.
signin_continue: Sign in to continue your journey.
start_journey: Start your learning adventure with us.
agree_terms: I agree to the <1>Terms of Service</1> & <3>Privacy Policy</3>

sidebar.no_courses_found: No courses found matching your criteria.

spam_prompt: Having trouble? Check your spam folder.
verify_phone_intro: We've sent a 6-digit OTP to your number
verify_email_intro: We've sent a 6-digit OTP to your email
phone_otp_resent_success: A new OTP has been sent to your phone.
phone_update_success: Phone number updated. A new OTP has been sent.
email_otp_resent_success: A new OTP has been sent to your email.
email_update_success: Email updated successfully. A new OTP has been sent.
change_phone_subtitle: Enter your new number. We'll send a new OTP to verify it.
change_email_subtitle: Enter your new email. We'll send a new OTP to verify it.
forgot_password_subtitle: No problem. Enter your email address below and we will send you a link to reset it.
reset_link_sent: Password reset link has been sent to your registered email id.
reset_password_subtitle: Please enter your new password below.
password_updated_success: Password updated successfully! Redirecting to login...
chatbot_welcome_bubble: Hello! I am TANISI, your AI Tutor for the Course on {{courseTopic}}. If you have doubts, you can ask me by clicking here.
chatbot_modal_intro: Hello! I am TANISI your AI Tutor for the Course on {{courseTopic}}.
chatbot_course_completed_message: TANISI AI Tutor is no longer available for new queries in this course as you have completed it. You can still view your previous chats.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.phone_invalid: The phone number provided is invalid.
errors.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.terms_required: You must agree to the terms.
errors.phone_exists: This phone number is already registered.
errors.not_verified: Your account is not fully verified.
errors.session_terminated: Session expired. Please log in again.
errors.enter_new_phone: Please enter a new phone number.
errors.enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.logout_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to logout?
errors.delete_confirm: Delete Account functionality to be implemented.
errors.email_not_registered: Entered email is not registered. Please enter a registered email id.
errors.password_reset_invalid: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.
errors.phone_fraudulent: The Phone Number {{phoneNumber}} is flagged as fraudulent by our verification partner. Please register with an alternate phone number or contact our support at support@seekmycourse.com.
errors.quiz_generation_failed_format: Quiz generation failed due to an unexpected format from AI. Please try again.
errors.quiz_generation_failed_structure: Quiz generation failed: The AI response was malformed or incomplete. Please try again.
errors.chatbot_connection_error: I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
errors.chatbot_typing_message: TANISI is getting information for you...
errors.video_language_notice_message: You've selected a language other than English. We will do our best to find relevant videos in your chosen language. However, if our AI cannot find a suitable video, we will provide a relevant video in English for the lesson instead.
errors.no_suitable_video_found_placeholder: No suitable video found for this lesson. An English video will be provided instead if available, or a relevant image.
errors.course_not_completed_certificate: You must complete the course and pass the quiz to get a certificate.
You must complete the course and pass the quiz to get a certificate.

course_generation.step1_description: What do you want to master today? Enter any topic, and our AI will craft a personalized course just for you. Let your curiosity lead the way!
course_generation.step2_description: Here are the learning objectives our AI has crafted for your course. Feel free to edit them to perfectly match your goals.
course_generation.step3_description: These are the expected outcomes. After this course, you'll be able to do these things. Adjust them as you see fit.
course_generation.step4_description: How deep do you want to go? Choose the number of sub-topics you'd like to cover in your course.
course_generation.step6_description: This is your course blueprint! Add up to {{maxCustomLessons}} custom lessons (max 2 per subtopic) and regenerate the index once to include them.
course_generation.lesson_refinement_modal_text: Our AI has refined your topic. Please select one to add it to your course.
course_generation.max_custom_lessons_error: You can only add a maximum of {{maxCustomLessons}} custom lessons in total.
course_generation.max_lessons_per_subtopic_error: You can only add a maximum of 2 custom lessons per subtopic.
course_generation.suggestions_error: Could not get suggestions at this time. Please try again.
course_generation.course_data_missing_error: Could not find course data or lessons to navigate. Please try regenerating.
course_generation.refine_topic_modal_message: We've generated a few alternative topics based on your input. Please select the best fit for your course to ensure a high-quality learning experience.
